nodes.text: "Marsune and Gallo" was a game played by Gungan children in forests and swamps on the planet Naboo, after the year 3000 BBY. The game recreated the story of two legendary figures in Gungan history, Boss Gallo and Captain Marsune, who in 3,000 BBY ended a war between the Gungan tribes by uniting them against Rogoe, the warlord that instigated the conflict.

"Marsune and Gallo" was mentioned in the databank entry for Marsune in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. The game was based on the missions completed by the player in the first three levels of the Gungan campaign.
